title: UK doubles troops in Norway to counter Russian 'threat to Arctic'
summary_full: Defence Secretary John Healey says British personnel in Norway will rise from 1,000 to 2,000 over three years.
summary_public: Defence Secretary John Healey says British personnel in Norway will rise from 1,000 to 2,000 over three years.

GB.label: positive
GB.evidence: UK doubles troops in Norway to counter Russian 'threat to Arctic'
